column4: I have just installed ubuntu and as I was downloading udates it froze for 15 mins after which i restarted my computer. It appeared fine until it claimed to be finished and left me with a command prompt instead of a Graphical Login. How do I get gnome to work correctly?
this happended to me too, I just redid the installation and then it worked
I did that and nothing happened
is there and apt for just checking for all available updates?
yeah
'well
actually
i did it sudo apt-get install -f
you can try: sudo apt-get -f install
then entered pass
After running that command it return that nothing was changed and 27 were not upgraded
do you have a laptop?
yes
I have a laptop
that card was fully recognized

it's onboard something to the order of wavelan 11b?
